Name: Lollo Campaign: Navigation VII
Description: As the Campaign nears its conclusion, an emergency arises. Your immediate assistance is needed to address the situation…
QuestDesc: As the Campaign nears its conclusion, an emergency arises. Your immediate assistance is needed to address the situation…

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The rain from last night finally stopped, {PlayerName}. And the trial run of our program is finally drawing to a close.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let me see if "Lollo Navigator" has received any... Wait a sec, someone actually used the expedite feature.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's from a courier near Taoyuan Vale. Looks like that heavy rain last night did a number on the shipping labels.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now they can't make out the goods and need help from the "Lollo Navigator."

Options.PlotLineKey: Can shipping labels also be recorded?

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Of course not, it would count as a violation of the user's privacy. But don't forget that the map is updated live.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It can't record the user's information, but it can record and track their transportation routes on the map.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Each goods use different routes, so we can make a rough estimate based on this information, and then use the logistics system to verify.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's go, {PlayerName}. Gotta save that perfect score on the last day of the trial run!

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Phew... I'm so beat. Even with "Lollo Navigator," it took a helluva longer than I expected.

Options.PlotLineKey: But it was worth the good reviews.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're right. "Lollo Navigator" did its job well, and thank you for testing out all of the many features during its trial run.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll sort out all this data and fix any potential problems. Here's hoping that "Lollo Navigator" can officially go live and be promoted for mass use someday…

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: See this, I left a spot right next to the developer's credits...

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yup. Wait for my good news. Goodbye, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After some hard work, you and Maji used the data recorded by "Lollo Navigator" to help the couriers verify their goods. In the end, all the couriers gave you a thumbs-up.
